<template>
    <div class="container">
        <Button @click="insertForm = !insertForm" class="add-button">
            <img src="https://www.svgrepo.com/show/521942/add-ellipse.svg" height="25" width="350">
        </Button>
        <!-- Insert start -->
        <div class="row">
            <div class="row justify-content-end">
                <div class="col">
                    <Modal id='insert' v-model:visible="insertForm">
                        <div id="body">
                            <form id="insert" @submit="e => insert(e)">
                                #inputInsert#
                                <div className="mb-3">
                                    <Button variant="primary" class="btn btn-primary insert-button" type= "submit" >
                                        Insert
                                    </Button>
                                </div>
                            </form>
                        </div>
                    </Modal>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!-- Insert end -->

        <!-- Pagination area -->
       
        <!-- Pagination area end -->      

        <!-- List start -->
        <div class="row">
            <table class="table">
                <thead>
                    <tr>
                        #header#
                        <th style="display: flex;">
                            <div class="button-group-1">
                                <Button v-if="page > 0" height="25" width="25" type="submit" @click="this.previousValues()">
                                    <img src="data:image/png;base64,"
                                    height="25" width="25" style="transform: rotate(180deg); border-radius: 50%; border: 1px solid white;"/>
                                </Button>
                                
                                <Button height="25" width="25" type="submit" @click="this.nextValues()">
                                    <img src="data:image/png;base64,"
                                    height="25" width="25" style="transform: rotate(0deg); border-radius: 50%; border: 1px solid white;"/>
                                </Button>
                            </div>
                        </th>
                    </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                    <tr v-for="item in #path#" :key="item.#id#">
                        #tableValue#
                        <td style="display: flex; gap: 00px;">
                            <div class="button-group-1">
                                <button style="background-color: #91915a"  @click="targetItem = item; updateForm = !updateForm">
                                    <img src="https://www.svgrepo.com/show/522527/edit-3.svg" height="25" width="25"  alt="Update"  />
                                </button>
                                <button style="background-color: #ca7575"  @click="targetItem = item; deleteForm = !deleteForm">
                                    <img src="https://www.svgrepo.com/show/502608/delete-2.svg" height="25" width="25" alt="Delete" />
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>
        </div>
        <!-- List end -->

        <!-- Update start -->
        <Modal id="update" v-model:visible="updateForm" title="Delete">
            <h2>Update #entity#</h2>
            <div id="body">
                <form id="update" @submit="e => update(e)" v-if="updateForm">
                    #inputUpdate#
                    <div className="mb-3">
                        <Button class="btn btn-primary update-button" type= "submit" >
                            Update
                        </Button>
                    </div>
                </form>
            </div>
        </Modal>
        <!-- Update end -->

        <!-- Delete start -->
        <Modal id="delete" v-model:visible="deleteForm">
            <h2>Delete #entity#</h2>
            <div id="body">
                <form id="delete" @submit="e => del(e)" v-if="deleteForm">
                    <div className="mb-3">
                        <Button class="btn btn-danger delete-button" type= "submit" >
                            Delete
                        </Button>
                      </div>
                </form>
            </div>
        </Modal>
        <!-- Delete end -->
    </div>
</template>

<script>
    import { Modal } from 'usemodal-vue3';
    
    export default{
        data(){
            return {
                page: 1,
                url: '#url#',
                items: null,
                targetItem: null,
                insertForm: false,
                deleteForm: false,
                updateForm: false,
                loading: false,
                pagination_start: 0,
                pagination_end: 10,
                candSendRequest: true,
                message: null,
                pagin_range: 10,
                #values#
            }
        },
        // eslint-disable-next-line vue/multi-word-component-names
        name: '#entity#',
        mounted(){
            this.getAll();
            this.getPaginedData();
        },
        components: {
            Modal
        },
        methods: {
            setEndValue(value){
                if(value < 0 || value < (this.pagination_start ?? 0)){
                    this.candSendRequest = false;
                    this.message = "Enter a valid value for end";
                }else{
                    this.candSendRequest = true;
                    this.message = "";
                }
                this.pagination_end = value ;
            },
            setStartValue(value){
                if(value < 0 || value > (this.pagination_end ?? 0)){
                    this.candSendRequest = false;
                    this.message = "Enter a valid value for start";
                }else{
                    this.candSendRequest = true;
                    this.message = "";
                }
                this.pagination_start = value;
            },
            getPaginedData(){
                const urlType = this.url + '#path#/' + this.pagination_start + "/" + this.pagination_end;
                console.log(urlType);
                try{
                    fetch(urlType) 
                    .then(response => response.json()) 
                    .then(data => { this.#path# = data; }) 
                    .catch(error => alert(error));
                }catch (error) {
                    alert(error);
                }
            },
            nextValues(){
                this.pagination_end += this.pagin_range;
                this.pagination_start += this.pagin_range;
                this.page += 1;
                this.getPaginedData();
            },
            previousValues(){
                this.pagination_end -= this.pagin_range;
                this.pagination_start -= this.pagin_range;
                this.page -= 1;
                this.getPaginedData();
            }
            ,
            async getAll() {
                /*try {
                    this.loading = true;
                    const response = await fetch(this.url + '#path#');
                    if (!response.ok) {
                        throw new Error('Erreur réseau');
                    }
                    const data = await response.json();
                    this.items = data;
                    this.loading = false;
                } catch (error) {
                    if(this.loading) this.loading = false;
                    alert(error);
                }*/
                try{
                    #getValues#
                }catch (error) {
                    if(this.loading) this.loading = false;
                    alert(error);
                }   
            },
            async update(event) {
                event.preventDefault();
                const updateData = this.fetchFormData(event.target);
                const dataToSend = this.mergeData(this.targetItem, updateData);
                try {
                    const response = await fetch(this.url + 'region', {
                        method: 'PUT',
                        headers: {
                            'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(dataToSend)
                    });
                    if (!response.ok) {
                        throw new Error('Erreur réseau');
                    }
                    this.updateForm = false;
                    this.getAll(); // reload local data
                } catch (error) {
                    alert(error);
                }
            },
            async del(event) {
                event.preventDefault();
                try {
                    const response = await fetch(this.url + '#path#', {
                        method: 'DELETE',
                        headers: {
                            'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(this.targetItem)
                    });
                    if (!response.ok) {
                        throw new Error('Erreur réseau');
                    }
                    this.deleteForm = false;
                    this.getAll(); // reload local data
                } catch (error) {
                    alert(error);
                }
            },
            async insert(event) {
                event.preventDefault();
                const insertData = this.fetchFormData(event.target);
                try {
                    const response = await fetch(this.url + '#path#', {
                        method: 'POST',
                        headers: {
                            'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(insertData)
                    });
                    if (!response.ok) {
                        throw new Error('Erreur réseau');
                    }
                    console.log("Réponse", response);
                    this.insertForm = false;
                    this.getAll(); // reload local data
                } catch (error) {
                    alert(error);
                }
            },
            fetchFormData(dataForm) {
              const formData = new FormData(dataForm);
              var data = {};
              for (let [key, value] of formData.entries()) {
                if (dataForm.elements[key].tagName === 'SELECT') {
                  data[key] = { id: value };
                } else {
                  data[key] = value;
                }
              }
              console.log("data to send ", data); 
              return data;
            },
            mergeData(data, data2){
              for(let index in data){
                if(data2[index] != "" & data[index] != data2[index]){
                  data[index] = data2[index];
                }
              }
              return data;
            }
        }

    }
</script>

    left: -19.992px;

    .jimu-primary-loading:before,

    .jimu-primary-loading {
  background: #076fe5;

  animation: loading-keys-app-loading 0.8s infinite ease-in-out;
  width: 13.6px;

}

.jimu-primary-loading {
  text-indent: -9999em;
  margin: auto;
  position: absolute;
  right: calc(50% - 6.8px);
  top: calc(50% - 16px);
  -webkit-animation-delay: 0.16s !important;
  animation-delay: 0.16s !important;
}

@-webkit-keyframes loading-keys-app-loading {

  0%,
  80%,
  100% {
    opacity: .75;
    box-shadow: 0 0 #076fe5;
    height: 32px;
  }

  40% {
    opacity: 1;
    box-shadow: 0 -8px #076fe5;
    height: 40px;
  }
}

@keyframes loading-keys-app-loading {

  80%,

}
